title: Sofa

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a sofa, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of a sofa depicting the new design;
FIG. 2 is a front elevation view of the sofa;
FIG. 3 is a top plan view of the sofa; and,
FIG. 4 is a side elevation view of the sofa, the other side being a mirror image thereof.
